comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Ambassadors_of_the_United_K... suggests that a Sir Henry Howard was "Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary" from the UK to the Vatican from 1914-1916. Born: Berlin, Germany 11th Aug 1843 Died: 4th May 1921 Wairarapa Daily Times, Volume LXVII, Issue 14162, 15 December 1914, Page 6 (New Zealand) [ paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&d=WD... ] announces his appointment. www.jstor.org/stable/2186867?seq=1 provides more detail.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
swanq,

Thanks for the additional on Sir Howard, and his rather impressive titles.  We will add more to the record when we update.
